definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: The chalk rasped across the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 粉笔划过黑板发出刺耳的声音。

sentences.english: Holidays indicated by the detector shall be marked with chalk or felt-tip marker to identify the area to be repaired.
sentences.chinese: 漏涂仪显示的漏涂区域用粉笔或毡制粗头笔标识。

sentences.english: A few months later, he worked hard on a small blackboard chalk, and finally succeeded.
sentences.chinese: 几个月后，他用一块小黑板苦练粉笔字，终于成功。

sentences.english: I have used up all of the chalk would you fetch. some more from the office?
sentences.chinese: 粉笔用完了，您到办公室牟回一些来，可以吗？

sentences.english: You may chalk it on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用粉笔把它记在墙上。

sentences.english: I watched him draw a picture with chalk.
sentences.chinese: 我看着他用粉笔画了一幅画。

sentences.english: Chinese chalk acts like boric acid as it abrades the roach’s shell.
sentences.chinese: 中国粉笔像硼酸一样可以损伤小强的外壳。

sentences.english: Oh, I've run out of chalks .
Simple, buy white grooming chalk and sprinkle it into the coat once a week or as needed.
sentences.chinese: 简单，买白粉笔培育和泼到大衣每周一次或视需要。

sentences.english: Drawing with chalk can be done on paper as a medium and is good for blending colors.
sentences.chinese: 用粉笔画上可以做芯纸，并作为用于混合的颜色好。

sentences.english: He sopped up the ink with  chalk.
He began to work a problem on a"blackboard" with a piece of chalk.
sentences.chinese: 他开始用粉笔在一块“黑板”上算题。

sentences.english: A small heart in Chalk White crystal dangles gracefully around her neck.
sentences.chinese: 小心脏以粉笔白色结晶优雅地垂在她的脖子上。

sentences.english: This small factory supplies chalk to our school.
sentences.chinese: 这家小工厂为我们学校供应粉笔。

sentences.english: Please pass (bring) me the red chalk.
Then the wolf ran away to a shop and bought a great stick of white chalk.
sentences.chinese: 于是大野狼便跑到一家商店去买了一根白色的大粉笔。

definition: to write on the blackboard/writing on the blackboard
